website_summaries.verdict: Oil, gasoline, and coolant have met their match with this reusable and absorbent garage mat.
pros: Instead of simply holding leaks from your car, this oil spill mat uses absorbent fabric that wicks away moisture for better containment
The waterproof backing prevents liquids like brake fluid and transmission fluid from seeping through
Simple to clean and reuse with soapy water and light scrubbing
cons: Waterproof backing can weaken and melt if you live in an extremely hot area

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product Dissolves When Exposed to Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product to catch the oil from one of my vehicles. Product failed miserably at its one job. The bottom of the Matt got dissolved by oil, and turned into some king of black goo. Parts of it are all over the garage floor now and look terrible. Update 10/27/19. The coating on the back of the mats has completely disintegrated, the rubber goo was all over the garage floor. I spent 10 minutes scraping it off, and then threw away both mats. Avoid at all costs. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Montana

customer_reviews.title: The mat does catch oil, however the material on ...
customer_reviews.text: The mat does catch oil, however the material on the bottom seems to have melted a bit in the heat and some of the oil seeped through. The bottom of the mat is now very gummy and oily. But for short term, it does get the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are well made, look good , feel good, so they must be real good! customer_reviews.title: Too expensive

customer_reviews.title: Totally spill proof

The felt absorbs the liquid so that it does not "run" to the edge and floor, under. I love it. This is the 4th or 5th time I've used Drymate for the same purpose - different locations. So for that reason, I bought several mats. We just bought a new house and I dont want to start out with oily spots. I am pleased that they dont blow around on windy days when I open the garage door. customer_reviews.title: Great for engine work and also a tool mat.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat to use while working on your vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Works great,
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to line the drip pan you have under your daily driver or project vehicle you have in the garage. The product says you can clean it and reuse it but for the price it’s cheap enough to just replace it when it can’t soak up anymore liquid. If it’s full of oils, lubricants or coolant please make sure to dispose of it at your local house hold hazardous waste facility...

product_meta.description: Size:29" x 36"The Drymate Oil Spill Mat protects your garage floor from leaks and spills. The absorbent fabric contains leaks and the waterproof backing prevents moisture and oil from seeping through. Our patented Drymate material absorbs and contains liquids and wicks away moisture. The waterproof layer stops motor oil, brake fluid, gasoline, coolant, and prevents these liquids from soaking through. Also, our Drymate slip-resistant backing helps to keep the oil mat securely in place and prevents it from moving around. When your oil mat gets dirty, simply scrub with soap, hose off and hang dry. Do not bleach. This mat is reusable, durable, and easy to clean. Drymate products are proudly made in the USA. For best results place oil mat underneath the car to protect garage surface. Be proactive, not reactive.
